event.body: We start the LocationTech roadshow with a happy hour and great talks in the national capital of Canada. This evening event is a must attend session on Enterprise class digital mapping & building location-aware systems with open source components.

Join us for a Geo Meetup in downtown Montreal for the second stop of the LocationTech Tour. Find out more about recent developments in the mapping world & location-aware systems in a blitz of lightning talks in a happy hour setting.

The LocationTech "East Coast Blitz" concludes in Washington, DC on November 14th. Join us at The George Washington University for a round of invigorating talks in the early evening, followed by drinks and networking at a nearby watering hole.

Coinciding with the second meeting of the new GeoPhilly meetup, LocationTech Philadelphia will feature a conference-style speaker series in the afternoon, followed by a social happy hour event with lightning talks in the evening.

The LocationTech roadshow comes to the Big Apple on 11/12/2013. Join us for a night of networking and learning. Come for the drinks and stay for the lightening talks from leading New York geospatial voices
This one day conference combines two important and dynamic technology areas: geospatial, and internet of things. This event includes presentations and workshops around data, development, and design.
